official_title: A bill to extend the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act.
short_title: National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Amendments

summary.text: National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Amendments - Extends the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act through June 30, l976. Authorizes appropriations for such purpose.

titles.title: National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Amendments
A bill to extend the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act.
